channel.title: Oregon on Hello Haileys
channel.description: Recent content in Oregon on Hello Haileys

item.title: Road Trip Through Oregon
item.description: Last Month, Jordan and I were able to set out on our first road trip from Oregon down to California. We didn’t realize how fun the stop along the way would be. Driving down from Oregon to California is a 13+ hour drive. Basically the distance from Johannesburg to Cape Town in South Africa. That’s when I really realised how big America is. The first stop we made was in Jacksonville, Oregon.
